title: Chief01
body: What do you want. Can't a man drink in peace. [[Answer:Player69|Player01a]]Hi there [[Answer:Player02|Player02b]]

title: Player01a
body: Sorry to bother you sir, I just had a few questions about the murder [[Answer:Node|Chief02b]]

title: Player02b
body: Most people aren't the chief of police [[Answer:Chief02.b|Chief02.b]]

title: Chief02b
body: What murder? *[i]burp[/i]* [[Answer:Node|Player03]]

title: Chief02.b
body: I'm chief of police when I'm behind a desk. [[Answer:Chief02c|Chief02c]]

title: Chief02c
body: The only lessons you learn in this schoolhouse is how to feel sorry for yourself. [[Answer:Player02.1a|Player02.1a]]

title: Player03
body: The murder where the deer man was ripped open, roughly 40 feet that way. [[Answer:Chief03a|Chief03b]]

title: Chief03b
body: That? Pssh, that wasn't a murder [[Answer:Chief03c|Chief03c]]

title: Chief03c
body: That was a coyote attack. Nothing nefarious [[Answer:Player04|Player04]] [[Answer:Player05|Player05]]

title: Player04
body: Are you blind or just stupid? [[Answer:Wolfington04b|Wolfington04b]]

title: Player05
body: Coyotes, well known for their brazen attacks in the middle of a city [[Answer:Chief05a|Chief05a]]

title: Chief05a
body: *[i]gulp[/i]* Y...yes coyotes. What else could it have been? [[Answer:Player07|Player07]] [[Answer:Player06|Player06]]

title: Player07
body: If your memory improves, call me

title: Player06
body: <reqVar>wolfSuspect 1</reqVar>Maybe something a little more... lupine?[[Answer:Wolfington06b|Wolfington06b]]

title: Wolfington04b
body: Now, I'm sure our esteemed Chief of Police has good reasons for his conclusions. [[Answer:Wolfington04c|Wolfington04c]]

title: Wolfington04c
body: Basil D. Wolfington, at your service. I run this little watering hole, along with most of the town. But who's counting [[Answer:Player08|Player08]] [[Answer:Player09|Player09]]

title: Player08
body: Pleased to be your acquaintance. [[Answer:Wolfington10b|Wolfington10b]]

title: Player09
body: So it's you who's crushing the investigation. Interesting. [[Answer:Wolfington06b|Wolfington06b]]

title: Wolfington06b
body: Surely you are not insinuating any member of my family had anything to do with this heinous act. [[Answer:Player10|Player10]]

title: Player10
body: I go where the evidence leads, Mr. Wolfington. [[Answer:Wolfington10b|Wolfington10b]]

title: Wolfington10b
body: Perhaps you and I should speak quietly about this case.

title: Player02.1a
body: At least we aren't dead in an alley. [[Answer:Chief02.1b|Chief02.1b]]

title: Chief02.1b
body: Yes. Poor John. Awful business, what those coyotes did. [[Answer:Player05|Player05]]
